Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Acid, Necrotic

Standard

Reach 4

+29 vs AC; 2d8+6 damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+29 vs AC; 1d10+6 damage; a slowed target is also knocked prone.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 4

Trigger: When an enemy misses with a melee attack against rhashaak, at-will

Targets the triggering enemy; +29 vs AC; 1d12+8 damage, and Rhashaak pushes the target 3 squares; a slowed target is also knocked prone.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+25 vs Reflex; 4d8+5 and necrotic damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 acid and necrotic damage and a -4 penalty to AC and Reflex (save ends all).

Encounter âœ¦ Acid

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Rhashaak uses it immediately

Fear

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Trigger: When first bloodied

Rhashaak speaks an Abyssal word of power; close burst 10; +25 vs Will; the target is dazed and restrained until the end of Rhashaak's next turn.

Acid, Cold

Standard, While Bloodied

Close burst 5

+25 vs Reflex; 2d6+5 acid and cold damage, and the target is blinded and slowed until the end of Rhashaak's next turn. Miss: Half damage.

Recharge 4-6 âœ¦ Acid, Cold, Zone

Standard

Close burst 2

The burst creates a zone of acidic, wintry darkness that lasts until the end of Rhashaak's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except Rhashaak. Each creature entirely within the zone (except Rhashaak) is blinded, and each creature that enters the zone or begins its turn there takes 15 acid and cold damage and is slowed until the end of its next turn. Sustain Minor: The zone persists
